articles.description: Jadon Sancho will receive a ticking-off after starring in Borussia Dortmund's 2-0 win at Wolfsburg for hugging teammate Achraf Hakimi during the celebrations of their second goal.
articles.content:
Jadon Sancho will receive a ticking-off after starring in Borussia Dortmunds 2-0 win at Wolfsburg.
